metadata.title: RZ/G: Information to refer to when starting an evaluation

sections.content:
Question:
Is there any information other than the RZ/G page (https://www.renesas.com/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rzg-series) to refer to when starting an evaluation?
Answer:
Please use this website (https://jira-gasg.renesas.eu/confluence/display/REN/Renesas+Wiki) in addition to the RZ/G page.
It contains information necessary for customers to evaluate the board, including startup procedures, build instructions, and S/W usage.
Suitable Products
RZ/G2H, RZ/G2M, RZ/G2N, RZ/G2E
RZ/G2L, RZ/G2LC, RZ/G2UL, RZ/Five
RZ/G3S
